name: location-covid-tracker
description: Location-based COVID-19 tracker with Dracula theme

scripts.build: rm -rf public && NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=4096' parcel build src/index.html --dist-dir public --no-source-maps --no-cache
scripts.github: rm -rf docs && NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=4096' parcel build src/index.html --dist-dir docs --no-source-maps --no-cache
scripts.serve:build: npm run build && npm run serve
scripts.deploy: gitcommit deploy && npm run build && vercel --prod

author: Jason M. Hempstead (Casjay) <git-admin@casjaysdev.com> (https://location.covid.casjay.coffee)
